item.title: Basic Inkscape Scientific Poster Design Workshop
item.description: ###Introduction to Inkscape and Scientific Poster Design### This is a very brief initial workshop designed to introduce Inkscape. The main goal here is to get a general overview of how to create a poster layout with Inkscape, get familiar with the software, and understand a little about putting a scientific poster together. A pdf version of this workshop can be downloaded here. I’m aiming to have an online version of this workshop avaiable in the not too distant future, watch this space!
